original_text: I would have been glad to keep him with me, in order that he might serve me on your behalf during my imprisonment for the gospel,
korean_text: 그를 내게 머물러 있게 하여 내 복음을 위하여 갇힌 중에서 네 대신 나를 섬기게 하고자 하나

sentences.original_text: I would have been glad to keep him with me
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그를 나와 함께 있게 하여 기뻐했을 것이다

sentences.original_text: in order that he might serve me
during my imprisonment for the gospel
sentences.korean_translation: 복음 때문에 내가 갇혀 있는 동안
